articles.author: NEWS WIRES
articles.title: 57000-year-old Neanderthal engravings found in France's Loire Valley - FRANCE 24 English
articles.description: The oldest known cave engravings in France, and possibly Europe, have been discovered in the Loire Valley, with researchers uncovering designs dating back at least 57,000 years to the age of Neanderthals.
articles.content: The oldest known cave engravings in France, and possibly Europe, have been discovered in the Loire Valley, with researchers uncovering designs dating back at least 57,000 years to the age of Neandert… [+1560 chars]
